description.name: PayPal Card Payments
description.tagline: Process credit and debit card payments with PayPal®.
description.long:
## Credit and debit card processing, simplified by PayPal.


PayPal Card Payments is **our latest PayPal integration for card-based payments**, replacing PayPal Payments Pro and PayFlow Pro.

Using PayPal Card Payments requires our PayPal Payments integration, allowing you to provide **transparent processing** of accepted payment types through your PayPal merchant account.
features: PayPal Advanced Checkout — Accept credit and debit cards through an unbranded experience powered by PayPal Advanced Checkout.
Vaulted Payment Methods — Securely store payment methods with PayPal Vault ([for supported countries](http://go.whmcs.com/1801/PayPal-Payments-service-regions)).
Full WHMCS Integration — Manage customer disputes, issue refunds, and view your PayPal merchant balance.
